title: UASM

params.attack: Kills the target regardless of what is happening to them. but technicly doesnt

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
* Kill someone at day and assume their identity. This effect is instant.
* Assuming someone's identity kills you instead of them without a death reason, hides your role and turns them into this role. This cannot be stopped by conversion immunities or simmilar abilities

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
* Your role will appear as a random role if it ever were to be seen by abilities that show roles that are hidden after death
* Investigative type roles will show you as the role of your last victim
* If your last target was in a faction chat, or a private chat, the said chat will not be informed of this ever happening
* If you are blocked from killing, you instead use your ability on said blocker. This can only happen once every day.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
* There can never be more than 1 UASM alive at any time, if someone else were to turn into this role while there already is one they will instantly die. This will not trigger if the effect of the 2 UASM was triggered by using this role's ability.
* This role can be rolled in Neutral Killing, Neutral Evil and Neutral Chaos slots
Wincon: Be the last one standing
Wincon Extra Part: Everyone that has been this role wins. This does not transfer between games.
